text: Messapus is a genus of African corinnid sac spiders first described by Eugène Simon in 1898. ==Species== it contains seven species: *Messapus martini Simon, 1898 — Zambia, South Africa *Messapus megae Haddad & Mbo, 2015 — Zimbabwe *Messapus meridionalis Haddad & Mbo, 2015 — South Africa *Messapus natalis (Pocock, 1898) — Mozambique, South Africa *Messapus seiugatus Haddad & Mbo, 2015 — Guinea *Messapus tigris Haddad & Mbo, 2015 — Botswana, Namibia *Messapus tropicus Haddad & Mbo, 2015 — Congo ==References== Category:Araneomorphae genera Category:Corinnidae
title: Messapus (spider)
